name: Unity Invector TPC + Diaz Climbing System
name_original: Unity Invector TPC + Diaz Climbing System
description:
Integration Unity Invector TPC and Diaz Climbing System

Asset used : Invector Third Person Shooter 2.6.2a  - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/game-toolkits/invector-third-person-...

                      Diaz Climbing Sytem 4.03

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/templates/systems/climbing-system-151612

Instructions:

1) Create a new project

2) Import Invector Third Person Shooter 

3) Import Diaz Climbing System

4) Set to old Input Sytem  and restart

5) Fixed error by commenting a few lines 

6) Install Cinemachine

7) Import the integration package (Invector_2.6.2a_DiazClimbing_4.03.unitypackage)

8) Overwrite InputManager and TagManager in Project Setting Folder

9) Open  Invector Diaz Test Scene

See video
